website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a pair of KEENs for your child that's crafted to stand up to wet, wintry conditions, these boots are likely to impress you.
pros: A must-have for kids who like to spend a lot of time outside in the winter, as they are constructed of waterproof leather and have grippy rubber soles
Available in sizes and colors for boys and girls from toddlers to big kids
cons: The downside of the sturdy construction of these boots is that they are a bit heavy, which is especially noticeable when it comes to little kids

customer_reviews.title: Runs small!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run super small! I bought 2 sizes larger than what my son normally wears. They look enormous, but when worn with a thicker sock, they fit him fine. However, they are super clunky and somewhat heavy. The sole/tread is much wider than a regular shoe. Not sure how comfortable they are for running and playing, but for occasional winter wear, I think they are fine. In the picture, the Keen Kootenay boot in size 10 is on the left and the Keen Peek a Shoe in size 9 is on the right. They fit my son about the same.
customer_reviews.author: sskd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alternative to clunky snowboots!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second pair of these and we LOVE them. My son is 8 and I hate sending him to school in big clunky snowboots when it's cold but not particularly snowy. These are PERFECT for those days, and they're so comfortable he often keeps them on at school all day (doesn't even bother to change into his sneakers). A must-have for us every winter.
customer_reviews.author: massachusetts1998

customer_reviews.title: I love these hiking boots for my preschool aged boys
customer_reviews.text: I love these hiking boots for my preschool aged boys! They can get them on without assistance and wear them all day without complaining. They run a little on the small side and I bought a size bigger and that worked great for us. They are tighter in the ankles, because they're hiking boots, so one of my kids had to get used to that feeling, but it's been a couple months and they love them! They clean up miraculously- even after being completely covered in black mud. Ask me how I know.
customer_reviews.author: Handsome + Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Easy Velcro and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Easy Velcro and Warm These are perfect for slipping on when camping, or running to the mailbox. They are comfortable enough to wear all day. This is my 2nd pair. The first ones lasted 5+ years but they are worn out. I wear a size 7 ladies and I got a 6 youth which will work great with warm socks.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is our third pair, replaced only because of size changes. Really great boots for outdoor loving kids. My daughters wear them near daily. They have been through tons and tons of mud and have held up wonderfully. They keep them warm and dry. When they have been submerged in knee deep mud, they washed easily by hand and dried over the heater without change in shape or fit. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Becky L

customer_reviews.title: Keen, a proven good product
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Recommend protecting them before use. Better looking and more comfortable option for a boys winter boot. Well made product as usual with Keen. Good sturdy sole, but has the typical clunk of the chunky sole. Warm and offers just the right amount of gift to wear a heavy sock, but also a thin sock without the shoe loosing its snugness. Colors are great!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Coz Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Look great and fit well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 7 year old to use on a ski trip. The boots look and feel nicely made. My son is picky about shoes but he liked how these fit, which was a relief because other snow shoes he tried on were too stiff for him. He also gets cold easily but these boots kept his feet warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: super durable!
customer_reviews.text: my daughter wore these for 2 seasons - wore them daily October thru April - and the seams are just now starting to come undone. they are awesome. the soles are still in great condition - I may just take them to a cobbler to reinforce the seams and donate them since my daughter has out grown them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Running small, too wide though
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boot, love it. My grandson wears toddler 8, I purchased 9 and it is too small on a normal thin sock. If anyone cares, weight of 1 boot size toddler 9 is 7.7 oz (220 g), inside length is 6”, widest part of sole is 3.5” (looks a little bit too wide)
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, wish they weren't slightly too small for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have a pair that are three years old. In trying to buy a new pair, I have bought three different ones and none of them fit right! I measured them against my old pair and they look like they should fit, but they're slightly too small. My toes feel crunched inside. Another pair I bought in the same size as my old ones was a 1/2 inch too long! I don't think Keen is sticking to a sizing chart anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Howard

customer_reviews.title: order 1-2 sizes up
customer_reviews.text: Ok I put "fit as expected" because the first time I ordered these, I ordered the same size as my son's Keen shoes--which are already a size bigger. But the boots were waaaaay too small. I ordered 2 sizes larger, and these seem to get on ok. A little loose, but he'll grow into them. So definitely, order 1-2 sizes larger than normal for your child.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher monica

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit heavy but so does all winter shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit heavy but so does all winter shoes so it's ok. My 3yr old boy chose this over other winter shoes. The material is very durable. Especially the toe kick is well protected for a toddler boy who runs around a lot.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Keen ankle winter boot
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for my toddler granddaughter who has very wide feet and a high arch. They are a size bigger than we would normally have purchased but they seem to do the trick. Reviews for these said that they run a bit small. She can get her foot in and out and with a thicker sock they'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie K

customer_reviews.title: Sizing problem?
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking and well made- however the sizing on the boots we got really confuses me. I ordered a whole size larger than my son currently wears and he says they are too small/tight. A friend also purchased these boots (same size) for her child with larger feet than my child and she has no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kmug

customer_reviews.title: We had these last year and they worked a bit better. Not sure why
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my almost 2 year old. He wears a size 7 right now and I got these in 8 so he would be able to wear them for the entire winter season. It's very difficult to get his foot in the shoe. You have to really jam it in there. We had these last year and they worked a bit better. Not sure why. Haven't used these in bad seasonal conditions yet. But I hope they'll perform as well as the ones last year.
customer_reviews.author: ToThePoint

customer_reviews.title: Order true to size
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots that appear very well made, but sadly I have to return them. When you order items like this online, you rely on reviews to help you with choosing the right size based on how it fits on others. I went up a full size for my 8 yo son who wears a 5 (big kid). He is swimming in them! It appears that it might just be the toddler sizes that are running small. If your child is in the big kid sizes, I suggest ordering true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Modigliani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Boot for First Grader
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our granddaughter and she loves them. They seem to be well built and made to last, which is good as we picked a color that could be handed down to her younger brother as well. Perfect boot for our climate and weather for a little first grader.
customer_reviews.author: tiv1

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes for my little guy but they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for my little guy but they are on the small, he wears a 9 and the 9s in these were almost an inch too small, I have reordered an 11, I am hoping it fits perfectly before it warms up!
customer_reviews.author: MichB

customer_reviews.title: Bad sizing, Great design
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots, but they are off by an entire size at least. Ordered 8s for my daughter who wears a 6.5, after she outgrew the 7s I had bought at the beginning of the winter.
customer_reviews.author: MinPHL

customer_reviews.title: Best winter shoes EVER
customer_reviews.text: I buy these shoes for my three boys every year. They are the perfect thing for rainy Pacific Northwest weather. They are heavy duty, but lightweight and keep my kids feet dry. Plus, they are easy on, easy off with the Velcro tab. LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Ali R.

customer_reviews.title: I love these and so does he
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old is so hard on shoes. I love these and so does he. They still look brand new after a few months of wearing them. (Did I mention he is hard on shoes) They also keep his feet warm and dry in the snow without having to wear is heavy snow boots. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boot
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews, ordered a whole size up. The warm lining inside narrows it a bit, so sizing up allows sock allowance. These are great on my two year old and keep her toes warm and dry. They seem a little heavy but she never complained. The solid toe is a must with a toddler!
customer_reviews.author: B. Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots!!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. My kids like them. Each kid got a pair. They are a bit bulky, but I also bought a size larger than they are currently in, so that probably plays into that.
customer_reviews.author: tftMom

customer_reviews.title: VERY LIGHT i like them but the sizes are a little smaller than ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY LIGHT i like them but the sizes are a little smaller than expected I took size 9 for my boy and he needs 10 with these so i will send them back and buy again. very happy seems very strong and warm
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Gutwerg

customer_reviews.title: It would have been perfect if it came in half sizes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but the 10t was too small and the other pair too big. Grandson needs 10.5 t. The shoe looked well made.
customer_reviews.author: carol b

customer_reviews.title: Rugged durable comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these boots. I bought him faux hiking boots from Carter's and he put a hole in them within a few weeks. He's tough on shoes. I decided to invest in real boots and always look to Keen for rugged and durable styles but with comfort in mind. The most annoying thing about these boots is trying to guess the size. My son wears about an 11.5 right now and I had to get a 13 for them to fit comfortably. Go up at least 1 size if not 2!
customer_reviews.author: A. V. Dillingham

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for winter and young kids! My son can wear these to and from the bus and school. He also can wear these all day at school. We have had these type of boots for the past three years and consider them a must have for winter. These run small but color, material are great.
customer_reviews.author: Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: good for snow
customer_reviews.text: Got to try these in the snow for the first time today and they worked very well. Warm and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Mcbzgd

customer_reviews.title: Bad sizing
customer_reviews.text: The look and colors are great, however the sizing is off. My son wears size 10 little kid, I bought size 11 of these and they were too small. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good initial impression, disappointed with durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my 10 year old and at first they looked great but definitely on a bulky/heavier side. Kid wore it for about a week and the bottom sole started to slowly un-glue from the top portion of the shoe so we've decided to return these shoes. Rather disappointed with overall durability of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: so Keens are a great fit for her
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has slightly wide feet, so Keens are a great fit for her. She is pretty picky about shoes but she loves these ankle boots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I love the quality
customer_reviews.text: Did fit large, but I love the quality. My son loves these shoes and is easy for him to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Jackielyn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am taking away one star for being a bit bulky. My daughter got used to it and likes wearing them we are yet to test it in the snow!! Will update once we do! Shoes are very well made and seems to be warm and comfy just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of three

customer_reviews.title: Warm.
customer_reviews.text: Love the material. They are warm and comfortable. They look durable .gr8 buy
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: and these boot were comfortable both indoors and outside
customer_reviews.text: I am buying these boots for 2 years in a row for my son. They seem to be comforyable and warm enough for NYC, but not too heavy or bulky. He must wear sneakers to school, and these boot were comfortable both indoors and outside.
customer_reviews.author: E.Me.

customer_reviews.title: I like the boots
customer_reviews.text: I like the boots, but they run somewhat wide and bulky. My 10 years old son was tripping while trying them on and walking a little bit around the room. Also, they are kind of girly looking. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: These are the best shoes I ever bought for my son
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes I ever bought for my son. And they're his favorite . I bought another pair since, for my other son. They're so sturdy and well made. Best quality !
customer_reviews.author: Ancu

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Stylish, warm, waterproof, and easy to slip on quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: nice, runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: nice waterproof leather, good quality. Runs somewhat small, and boots are somewhat hard.
customer_reviews.author: gprimosch

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is our third Pair of Keen shoes in this style. They are a bit heavy but offer great protection in cold climates. My son is very picky with shoes/boots and he loves these. The rubber tip is rugged and protects the feet in both rain and snow, and is excellent on playgrounds. These shoes last forever! And they ARE comfortable as far as shorts boots go. I buy them a size bigger that his regular size and they always fit just right (over a slightly thicker winter sock).
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great fit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and great fit. I took a size bigger - my girl is size 7 and I bought 8 just to have a little extra room. She loves them! I was afraid it will be bulky and heavy and they are not. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Julia P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered my son a pair of these 4 yrs in a row. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: LTaylor

customer_reviews.title: New England Winters
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 year old - he absolutely loves them. Heavier then his sneakers, but he can run and play comfortably. He says they are very warm and comfy. Easy to get on and off is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Monica B

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to get the feet in. Even if ...
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to get the feet in. Even if you get your feet in, you can't walk because they are too tight. Both kids refused to wear them after trying them on and asked me to return them to "prime".
customer_reviews.author: Mintlime

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!  Truly A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. They are a staple in my sons winter wardrobe. He swears they are just as comfortable as his tennis shoes. They are our go to boot!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Way too heavy and inflexible for toddler feet. Well made though. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is perfect especially for my child who does not know how ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is perfect especially for my child who does not know how to ties his shoe laces yet. Strong and durable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: wonderful colours.
customer_reviews.text: wonderful colours... expected keen fit and finish... size 6 fits my women's 7 1/2 feet just fine... super fun in soggy weather
customer_reviews.author: ls

customer_reviews.title: No Ankle Support
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BOOTS. Limited Ankle support which makes me very nervous. i try to strap the Velcro as tight as possible. these Boots should have ties with how heavy duty they are. Great boots overall!

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Durable warm kids boots. Perfect for preschool playing in the fall and winter on the playground
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great, waterproof boots that don't produce the heat of tall boots, yet keep out moisture. These are our go-to winter shoe choice!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Carter

customer_reviews.title: They are too hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a two year old. They were not really too small, but it's really hard to get their foot in the shoe. I love Keens, and always buy for my granddaughters in the summer. These look really nice, but way too difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.author: maureen schechtman

customer_reviews.title: i wanted to love these, but they were too wide for my ...
customer_reviews.text: i wanted to love these, but they were too wide for my girls, who have low volume feet. the quality is fantastic, though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C.

customer_reviews.title: what a great shoes for little explorers
customer_reviews.text: what a great shoes for little explorers. i bought those for my 2yr old daughter. These shoes kept her warm and dry throughout the fall/winter season of New England weather. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Had these for my now three year old last year and loved them. Perfect fall/winter all weather boots. Keene are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Django

customer_reviews.title: the shoe itself is great warm but the size is to small
customer_reviews.text: the shoe itself is great warm but the size is to small. my daugther is size 9 1/2 i ordered a 10 it fit her just right but i returned it because i needed room for thicker socks and room to grow
customer_reviews.author: thomas connors

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good so far. My so. Haven’t try it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Trinh Tran

customer_reviews.title: size run really small.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little boots but the size runs way too small. I order 2 sizes bigger for my girl and they still don't fit. She normally wears a 1 to 1.5 and so I order a 3 and they did not fit. way to small.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Bought for a camping trip -- worked great ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Bought for a camping trip -- worked great and we are still using them for hiking and fishing and all that good stuff that kids go and do.
customer_reviews.author: imaknoys

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They don't really work for snow play because they are not high enough but they do work for running errands, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Previous years have been great. This year is NOT water proof.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleMom

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable, light weight and yet hold up great- easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a pair of these Keen Winter Boots for my grandson for the last 3 years. They are comfortable, light weight and yet hold up great- easy for them to get on and off! Would highly recommend them- worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes will enjoy them when snow come. I recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size up for all keens toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Not the warmert but certainly the coolest snow boots. Easy to slip on.
customer_reviews.author: mhs

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Have held up very well so far on my little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boot. Like others have said: sizing is way off. Size 9 kootenay insole is same length as size 8 stride rite insole (but the toe box is wider on the keen). Other than sizing being off, it's a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: ETer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are really great! Warm
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really great! Warm, comfy, and totally waterproof. The only drawback is that they are a bit on the heavy side, but I guess you can't do better for a snow boot.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Soooo wide, but quality i guess.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but why so wide? They make my four year olds feet like unnaturally wide.
customer_reviews.author: flybyrd

customer_reviews.title: Great Winter Boots!
customer_reviews.text: My son had a similar pair when he was 3 - 4 yo and they still looked great after he had out-grown them. I was excited to see the same boot in his size as a 9 yo. They're stylish, durable and work well for that winter boot just below the level of big snow boots.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Confotable. Not cute for girl. But I want her to have confortable and warm shoes to go to school.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and comfortable in all kinds of weather
customer_reviews.text: This is my grandson's second pair. He loves them. They are sturdy and comfortable in all kinds of weather.
customer_reviews.author: mat

customer_reviews.title: Good children boot.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good boot, I can say instead of shoes. Easy to wear and easy to taking off. My son love it very much. The out sole is durable and avoid slip. Believe KEEN's quality. Will go and see the performance in winter weathers.

customer_reviews.text: Love the looks the fit the comfort everything about this shoes

customer_reviews.text: The best winter shoes for my boy! We love these shoes and wear them each day.They have withstood rain, snow, mud and countless outdoor adventures!

customer_reviews.text: True wide!!!! So great for my 5 yo! he's a 3xw and these were great

customer_reviews.text: Great little shoe, we just didn't get any snow this year

customer_reviews.title: Great winter shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 4 yo and they are a nice simple weatherproof boot. He seems to love them. Fuzz and warm with Keen reinforced toe.
customer_reviews.author: David Simmons

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great. My son found them comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. My son found them comfortable, but just a bit big. They are a very good shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Seasoned Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love Keen boots
customer_reviews.text: The size was as expected. My daughter loves the color. I only buy Keen brand for my kids because they have wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: juke owner

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible
customer_reviews.text: Keen's are amazing my kids wear out shoes like no ones business but keen's are indestructible I have to buy new ones only cause they out grow them and they still look almost new it's crazy we love them

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on and completely adorable
customer_reviews.text: They are warm, easy to put on and completely adorable!

customer_reviews.text: Super nice boots! Cushioned foot bed. Seems like they would be very warm!

customer_reviews.title: Boots your kids will love!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, my son LOVES these boots! He stomped around with them for days, excited to have boots "like Daddys!" Ive found they seem to be just as comfortable as sneakers + easy for him to put on + take off. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Racki

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful winter boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great, warm and comfortable boots! Keen is unbeatable! Very pleased!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Way too small, even though we bought one size up.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gilreath

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and stylish !! Grandson just loved them !!!
customer_reviews.author: bruv

customer_reviews.title: Definitely sticking with these boots for years to come
customer_reviews.text: My 2 y.o. wore them every day for several months. We leave in Seattle, so our winder is relatively mild but wet. These boots are perfect for our climate, warm enough without being too warm and waterproof for everyday rain. They are very easy to put on and off, so a 2 y.o. could do it by himself. Shame kids feet grow fast, these boots are very study and durable and will last a few seasons of everyday wear. If you have more than one kid, they are a fantastic investment even at full price.
customer_reviews.author: Lada

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them they are just what I wanted great In the snow. so easy to get on

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th season of purchasing this shoe and it do not disappoint! It's very durable, looks great long term and is very comfortable according to my 10 year old! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: addicted

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these a size larger knowing that I was ...

customer_reviews.title: After the whole season of hard wear the first pair looked almost like new and was handed to a younger friend

customer_reviews.title: Great! Waterproof, very high quality! 100% recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Buy them because a was going for or trip on january 22 to Hollywood studios, we had a very cold and rainy day for January 23 2016 where the weather in Magic kingdom was 6 centigrade. My 3 years old boy had a good time I didn't worry a bit. We returned 11am with a very cold weather . I'm a 100% satisfied customer.

customer_reviews.text: What great quality! Looking to see how they hold up to a 5 year old boy lol But looks like I've got nuthing to worry about Looking to get him more .

customer_reviews.title: We love these shoes for my kids
customer_reviews.text: We love these shoes for my kids! They are the best shoes for snow and cold weather. Great on icy areas. My son outgrows these before they even have any signs of wear. These are so well made!
customer_reviews.author: adam d walling

customer_reviews.title: Really nice great quality only thing is the size was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice great quality only thing is the size was a little small. My daughter being 3 likes to be in anything messy. She got the new size went to the dog park played in puddles came home rinsed off and still dry inside and her feet were warm. We will be getting these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Sinnitt

customer_reviews.title: My daughter doesn't like her feet to be overly warm
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesn't like her feet to be overly warm. These would be perfect if they were not fur lined.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: KEEN Kootenay Waterproof Winter Boot (Toddler/Little Kid), Magnet/Koi, 10 M US Toddler
product_meta.description: Ensure the comfort and coziness of your darling's foot wearing the Keen Kootenay WP boot. This boot has a waterproof upper that restricts moisture buildup and keeps your kid's foot dry and fresh. This boot also sports a hook-and-loop closure that gives a secure fit and allows for easy entry. Equipped with a dual compound snow and ice grip rubber outsole, this boot keeps your kid's gait and stance steady. The waterproof and breathable membrane maintains a desirable inner climate. This boot features faux shearling lining that promotes an abrasion-free environment.
feature_bullets: Features of this item include: Adjustable Strap, Leather, Mesh, Outdoor, Waterproof
